tfg

Class OrionConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • tfg.OrionConnector

  • public class OrionConnector
extends Object
    Connector to the ORion context broker. This connector uses only the NGSI10 service from Orion, and none of it's convenience methods.
    Author:
    Ivan Gracia (izanmail@gmail.com), Pablo OLiver Remon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrionConnector()
      Default constructor to be used when the orion connector is created from a spring context.
      OrionConnector(tfg.OrionConnectorConfiguration config)
      Orion connector constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrionConnector

        public OrionConnector()
        Default constructor to be used when the orion connector is created from a spring context.

      • OrionConnector

        public OrionConnector(tfg.OrionConnectorConfiguration config)
               throws tfg.OrionConnectorException
        Orion connector constructor. This constructor is to be used when the connector is used outside from a spring context.
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration object
        Throws:
        tfg.OrionConnectorException

    • Method Detail

      • registerContextElements

        public org.apache.http.client.fluent.Response registerContextElements(tfg.entities.OrionContextElement... events)
                                                               throws tfg.OrionConnectorException
        Register context elements in the Orion context broker.
        Parameters:
        events - List of events
        Returns:
        The response from the context broker.
        Throws:
        tfg.OrionConnectorException - if a communication exception happens, either when contacting the context broker at the given address, or obtaining the answer from it.

                                                             throws tfg.OrionConnectorException

        Parameters:
        events -
        Returns:
        The response from the context broker.
        Throws:
        tfg.OrionConnectorException - if a communication exception happens, either when contacting the context broker at the given address, or obtaining the answer from it.

      • queryContext

        public org.apache.http.client.fluent.Response queryContext(String type,
                                                  String id)
                                                    throws tfg.OrionConnectorException
        Queries the context broker for a certain element.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of context element
        id - the id of the context element
        Returns:
        The response from the context broker.
        Throws:
        tfg.OrionConnectorException - if a communication exception happens, either when contacting the context broker at the given address, or obtaining the answer from it.

      • queryContextWithPattern

        public org.apache.http.client.fluent.Response queryContextWithPattern(String type,
                                                             String pattern)
                                                               throws tfg.OrionConnectorException
        Queries the context broker for a pattern-based group of context elements
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the context element.
        pattern - the pattern to search IDs that fulfil this pattern.
        Returns:
        The response from the context broker.
        Throws:
        tfg.OrionConnectorException - if a communication exception happens, either when contacting the context broker at the given address, or obtaining the answer from it.
